评论详情: Great value, and i love the size of the clasp related to the more expensive alternatives, but the clasp on this necklace started becoming an issue after about 3 months. I had to push down on it to close the gap between the locking mechanism and the hook side. And even then, just a hand through my hair can unlock the necklace and have it falling. It can still be worn, but hair, and hands need to stay away from the clasp. Having this repaired would probably be more expensive than the necklace itself. May just buy another when this one breaks. I have a real silver necklace that the spring just straight up broke, so this necklace lasted longer than a real silver necklace.
